quotes.quote: It would be so good to settle down and become part of somewhere again, instead of constantly passing through.
The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.
The biggest human temptation is to settle for too little.
Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don't settle for them.
A champion is someone who does not settle for that day's practice, that day's competition, that day's performance. They are always striving to be better. They don't live in the past.
It's time to stop complying with the system and draw your own map. Stop settling for what's good enough and start creating art that matters.
Until you find something to fight for, you settle for something to fight against.
The Enemy of the best is the good. If you're always settling with what's good, you'll never be the best.
I think the secret is to just settle for the shape of your life takes. Instead of you know, always waiting and wishing for what might make you happy.

Don't settle for anybody just to have someone. Set your standards. What kind of love do you want to attract? List the qualities you really want in the relationship. Develop those qualities in yourself and you will attract a person who has them.
Imagine settling for a life you can have because you don't have the courage to go after the life you really want.
If you let cloudy water settle, it will become clear. If you let your upset mind settle, your course will also become clear.
One key to success is demanding more than adequacy, never settling for good enough and always doing a little bit more.
Instead of doing the best thing, we sometimes have to settle for the rightest thing.
Some people are settling down, some people are settling and some people refuse to settle for anything less than butterflies.

If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it. And, like any great relationship, it just gets better and better as the years roll on.
Let us not settle for what is simply 'OK' when we have full information on what can create lasting change.
If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
Why settle for so little in life when you can have so much just by daring to be different in your thinking.
Warfare is an utterly stupid method of settling differences of interest between different nations.
Where we're not wrong or where the cost of settling is so much that it is totally disproportionate to the harm or the error that we made, we're not going to settle.
Healing cannot be done by settling a score.
We won't figure out what's sacred in life if we settle for what's safe.
I always believed that when you follow your heart or your gut, when you really follow the things that feel great to you, you can never lose, because settling is the worst feeling in the world.
Don't tolerate any form of average. Don't accept Dis-excellence. Don't stand for mediocre. If you're going to settle, then please settle for the absolute best.
